price: (Wᴐn a) Yɛdii w’anim kan somaa wᴐn no na wᴐ‎yԑ nnipa na Yɛyii Adiyisεm no maa wͻn. Enti (Makafoͻ a moregye Muhammad akyinnyeε) sε monnim a, momisa wͻn a wͻkaekae (amanfoͻ) no.
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَبۡلَكَ إِلَّا رِجَالٗا نُّوحِيٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡۖ فَسۡـَٔلُوٓاْ أَهۡلَ ٱلذِّكۡرِ إِن كُنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnā qablaka illā rijālan nūḥī ilayhim fasalū ahla al-dhik'ri in kuntum lā taʿlamūna
